title: GERRY MULLIGAN Concert Jazz Band; Verve; Zoot (1960)
description:
I've already uploaded most of my favorites; but an unknown, endless list of 

undiscovered gems keeps my ears questing for sonic joy.


Amongst many fine big band recordings these Gerry Mulligan recordings from 1960

are very satisfying.  This is a VERVE compilation taken from (3) sessions

including the Village Vanguard NYC USA, Milan Italy, and Berlin Germany.



Gerry's philosophy was to create a jazz band which played not for dancing but

for listening, and which maintained the same clarity of sound and musical lines

which hallmarked his earlier quartet and small group performances.


Click on the number of files above (probably an 11) to check out the track titles
